typeSystemDescription.name: VLabSourceTypes
typeSystemDescription.description: Type system to encode information about a vLab source document

typeDescription.name: com.nicta.uimavlab.types.VLabRestInstance
typeDescription.description: Stores information about what the REST data source was on an HCS vLab server

featureDescription.name: serverBase
featureDescription.description: Base URI for the HCS vLab server REST API

typeDescription.name: com.nicta.uimavlab.types.VLabItemSource
typeDescription.description: Stores information about where an item was retrieved from in the HCS vLab REST API

featureDescription.name: sourceUri
featureDescription.description: URI in the HCS vLab REST API which was used to retrieve the document

featureDescription.name: itemId
featureDescription.description: ID of the item on the HCS vLab server

featureDescription.name: annotations
featureDescription.description: The textual annotations associated with the document

typeDescription.name: com.nicta.uimavlab.types.VLabDocSource
typeDescription.description: Stores information about where an document (source of an item) was retrieved from in the HCS vLab REST API

featureDescription.name: rawTextUrl
featureDescription.description: URL in the HCS vLab REST API which was used to retrieve the document's raw text

featureDescription.name: docType
featureDescription.description: Type of the document on the HCS vLab server

featureDescription.name: collection
featureDescription.description: The collection which the document comes from

featureDescription.name: identifier
featureDescription.description: Unique identifier for the document within the corpus

featureDescription.name: handle
featureDescription.description: Unique URI identifying the document uniquely on the server

featureDescription.name: recordingDate
featureDescription.description: Date on which the recording was made

featureDescription.name: discourseType
featureDescription.description: What type of discourse is stored in the item

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The label assigned to the annotation in the HCS vLab data

typeDescription.name: com.nicta.uimavlab.types.GeneratedItemAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Annotation type which is generated to conform to the set of known types in a corpus.

typeDescription.name: com.nicta.uimavlab.types.UnknownItemAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Type for annotations where annType does not correspond to a known type.
